item.title: Download Windows USB Blocker 6.0
item.description: Windows USB Blocker is a useful tool to quickly Block or unblock USB Storage Devices on any Windows system. USB devices are one of the main reasons why viruses/malware spread from one system to another without the user's knowledge. It is often very dangerous to allow someone else to insert a USB (often infected with a virus) into your system. Therefore, we always recommend that you turn off USB when not in use.
